item.description:
Improving Your Macintosh Experience

Chris Hart, of MyMacTech.com, has over 13 years of Macintosh computer
expertise. Chris will talk about improving your Mac experience -- through
maintenance, added speed, improved security, working more efficiently, and
adding some cool software. Q&A to address your computer needs to follow the
presentation.

TO RESERVE YOUR PLACE:  
- Go to: www.paypal.com and select the "Send Money" tab
- Insert "kolkdesign@usa.net" in "Recipient's Email".
- Type in the amount you wish to send. ($24 per person)
- Select "Service" for "Type" (of money sent).
- Put ICC meeting-April 21 in the "Subject" box.
- Note: Use the  PayPal message box to type in your meal preference. This time our meal choices are: Chicken Parmigana; Potato Crusted Basa Sole; or Veggie Pasta (vegetarian).

OUR RESERVATION DEADLINE is Thursday, April 16. You must be paid in accordance with the instructions above before your reservation is considered accepted. Because we have to plan ahead, we need to collect money in advance. If you need to cancel, we will be able to refund your money only if you PHONE Laura Kolk at 860.646.0542 by the end of the day on April 16th, so that we can cancel your reservation.

We're looking forward to seeing you there!

group.name: Independent Creative Club of Greater Hartford

item.name: Improving Your Macintosh Experience
